module.name: sipay
module.description: Fastpay accepts multiple forms of payment (Visa, MasterCard, AmericanExpress, UnionPayInternational, JCB, Discover and Dinners), Amazon Pay, PayPal, Google Pay, Apple Pay, Bizum, payment by transfer and payment financed through the Sipay payment wall . All payment methods with a single integration that help merchants sell more!
module.author: Sipay
